title: Backup and restore the mremote NG application settings
author: wongcc2012
body_snippet:
I am using the preview build v1.77.x in my environment for testing purpose. However sometimes the program will crash and the window settings are completely gone and I am not able to move nor resize the elements. the simple fix I found is to remove the %appdata% mrenoteNG folder to restore the clean state. However all the program Options are gone (startup / exit, tabs and panels...)

How can I backup or export the program options? I have tried to copy the %appdata% but seem not working when migra...

comments.snippet:
Hi @wongcc2012 

Please note that mRemoteNG also has some user specific settings in `%LOCALAPPDATA%\mRemoteNG` and not only in `%APPDATA%\mRemoteNG`.

With the new settings architecture in development (1.78+) the files etc. will be organized differently, but until then these two folders should be enough.
